result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Douglas Brantner was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Douglas Brantner

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael Douglas Brantner in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises defendant of charge/max penalties.  Defendant enters plea of no contest.  PLQ/WOR form filed with the court and reviewed with defendant. Court finds defendant's waiver of his constitutional rights and plea done knowingly & voluntarily, accepts plea and finds defendant guilty.  State recommends 1 yr. probation or 10 days jail.  Defendant agrees to probation.  Court w/holds sentence and places defendant on 1 yr. probation with conditions; waive costs.

Defendant Michael Douglas Brantner in court with attorney John Charles Bachman.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Bachman recently assigned on this case.  Status conference scheduled for February 7, 2017 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Michael Douglas Brantner in court with attorney Gary E. Smith.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Smith requests another date 1/17/17 to resolve matter.  Defendant confirms address:  805 3rd Ave E, Apt 19, Durand.  Status conference scheduled for January 17, 2017 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Michael Douglas Brantner in court with attorney Susan T Falch for attorney Gary Smith.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  NGP entered.  Status conference scheduled for December 20, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Michael Douglas Brantner in court with attorney Gary E. Smith.  Jon D. Seifert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises defendant of charges/max. penalties and rights.  Defendant updates address:  803 7th Ave E Apt 19, Durand  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for November 1, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
